column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Got one of the "pinxos" which actually means tapas in Euskara (Basque language) - so don't BS me with your marketing lol --- got the Iberico chorizo one...lackluster and they really put an American spin on tapas and chisel you
column2: it was literally a toothpick with a slice of chorizo...unbelievable
